pages.title: Ender Hopper
pages.text: Designed to resemble an ordinary hopper in form and function, the Ender Hopper has the special ability to put items directly into your $(thing)Ender Chest$(). Counterpart to the $(l:magical_blocks/ender_dropper)Ender Dropper$().

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Ender Hopper only works while you are online.
